Advanced Interlocution.name: 进阶沟通 Advanced Interlocution
Advanced Interlocution.description: 你以难以置信的效率引导精魂力量。你在能施放的每个法术环级上获得一个额外的精魄法术位，至多到你最高环级-2。例如，一个10级灵媒拥有一个额外的1环，2环，3环精魄法术位。

Alertness (Exemplar).name: 警觉（典范之人）Alertness (Exemplar)
Alertness (Exemplar).description: 你对细节的注意力让你维持对周遭威胁的警觉。你在察觉上的熟练度提升至专家。

Animist and Apparition Spellcasting.description:
你作为连接物质宇宙和外界领域的灵体媒介，让你可以用两种不同的方式施展魔法。你自己从神术根源中学习准备法术，同时也能够引导附灵精魄的知识和力量，这会赋予你法术位和一个你可以自发施法的来自精魄的法术库。

无论你使用的法术来源于哪个，你都是一名施法者，可以使用施法动作施放神术根源的法术。作为一名灵媒，你的法术可能是背诵传说的小片段——口头流传的故事——或则他们可能会看到你召唤周围的灵魂来纪念古老的誓言；你的姿势可以采用优雅的舞蹈或因代代传承的记忆和外界能量掠过你的身体而全身抽搐的形式。

一些法术需要你尝试法术攻击来判断他们多有效，或让你的敌人掷骰对抗你的法术DC（通常是尝试豁免）。因为你的关键属性是感知，你的法术攻击修正和法术DC都使用你的感知修正值。

灵媒与其精魄间明确划分的伙伴关系，意味着你不能使用你的精魄法术位施放你的灵媒法术，反之亦然——你的魔法是互补和谐的，即便他们来自两个确切不同的世界。

灵媒施法 Animist Spellcasting

作为知识的保管者，你不断地在学习新的故事和法术。每天，你可以从神术法术表中的常见法术里，或从你有获取许可并通过学习法术学会的其他神术法术中准备一个1环法术和两个戏法。准备法术在你施放它们，或是重新准备之前都是可用的。你能够准备的法术数量被称作法术位。.

当你的灵媒等级提升，你的法术位数量，以及可从法术位施放的最高环级也会随之提升，见灵媒每日法术表。

精魄施法 Apparition Spellcasting

你可以将你附灵的精魄用作第二种魔法知识和力量的来源。你从附灵精魄中获得额外法术位和一个法术库。一级时，你可以每天施放一次1环精魄法术。你必须在精魄法术库中拥有该法术才能施放它；这是一个你所有附灵的精魄赋予的法术的集合。这些法术通常不在神术表中，但你以该方式施放它们时仍然算作神术法术。随着你等级提升，你会获得更多精魄法术位，而你的精魄也将赋予你更高环级的精魄法术，详述见每个精魄条目。

升阶法术 Heightening Spells

当你获得2环或更高环的法术位，你可以把低环法术的加强版塞进这些法术位中。这会增加这些法术的环级，将之升阶到与法术位相应的环级中。许多法术在你升阶到特定环级时会有具体的增强。

这些灵魂不再如他们还是凡人施法者那样受限。你所有的精魄法术都是标志性法术（signature spells）。这意味着你可以随意将一个精魄法术升阶到更高环级的法术位上施放，最高到你能够施放的最高环级。

戏法 Cantrips

戏法是一种不使用法术位的特殊法术。你可以随心所欲的使用戏法，没有每日次数的限制。戏法会自动升环到你等级的一半并向上取整，一般来说会跟你的灵媒目前能施放的最高环法术相等。例如，一个1级灵媒，戏法就是1环法术；而一位5级灵媒，戏法就是3环法术.

附身法术 Vessel Spells

你的主附灵精魄可以使用你的身体作为媒介，允许你施放一个独特的附身法术。附身法术是一种聚能法术。它消耗1聚能点来施放聚能法术，你初始拥有一个2点聚能点的聚能池。你在每日准备时重新填满你的聚能池，并且你可以花费10分钟使用再聚能行动重新获得1聚能点，通过被周围灵魂治愈，冥想解决一个有关灵体和凡人间平衡问题，或讲述一个故事。

聚能法术被自动升阶至你等级的一半，向上取整，如同戏法。聚能法术不需要法术位，你也不能通过法术位来施放它们。某些专长会赋予你更多的聚能法术。你聚能池中的最大聚能点等于你拥有的聚能法术数量，但不会超过3点。
Animist and Apparition Spellcasting.name: 灵媒和精魄施法 Animist and Apparition Spellcasting

Animistic Practice.name: 灵媒流派 Animistic Practice
Animistic Practice.description:
1级时，灵媒选择一种影响其力量成长发展方式的流派。从下列流派中选择一种，获得其列出的增益。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.DCDHjeBcQSEdiRBX]{通灵师 Channeler}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.vvog6aXtEzkTNaBC]{贤者 Sage}

Apparition Attunement.name: 精魄附灵 Apparition Attunement
Apparition Attunement.description:
灵媒通过担任灵界实体——被统称为精魄——的桥梁来获取力量，以使得其与物质世界交融互动，此过程被称作附灵。精魄不可计数，种类繁多：他们可能是徘徊在成为魅影（phantom）和幽灵（ghost）边缘的人类灵魂，与物质世界有着特别强烈联系但又不带有会转变成真正不死生物的恶意的动物灵魂，会随着时间推移成长出思想和意志的自然场所的具现，或是其他各种诸如此类的实体。一些灵媒会附灵一个或多个特定的精魄，伴随他们旅行，形成深厚的友谊关系，而其他灵媒则通过帮助栖身于灵媒行过之处当地的精魄，来应对周遭环境。

在你每日准备时，选择两个在12页列出的精魄附灵。在这其中，选择一个作为你的主精魄。你附灵的每个精魄都会以学识技能和你用于施放精魄法术（见下文）的额外法术表的形式赋予你知识，你的主精魄会以一个独特的附身聚能法术的形式赋予你更强的力量，并在你达到更高等级时，赋予你一个独特的天神下凡形态。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-effects.Item.cTZnKRoVv19XNnoI]{效果：精魄附灵}

当你再聚能（5页）时，你可以将你当前附灵的精魄中一个改为你的主精魄，从你每日准备时附灵的任意精魄中选择。你所有精魄保持附灵于你，直到你下一次每日准备时，但一些灵媒能力可以暂时解散他们，通常是为了换取一个强大的好处。如果一个精魄被解散，你将失去他的赋礼——你遗忘它的精魄技能，它的法术从你的精魄法术表中移除，你不能使用它的附身法术或天神下凡形态——直到你再次附灵它。当你解散你的主精魄时，你剩余的精魄成为你的主精魄。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.YyDqj4xmqGNmoN8G]{园林看守 Custodian of Groves and Gardens}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.cNTI2tuFuFvGrpN2]{秘所骗徒 Imposter in Hidden Places}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.Lb1pfIgYX7plpwgX]{暗枝猎手 Stalker in Darkened Boughs}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.bHMzpJLICVFQEONg]{石火管家 Steward of Stone and Fire}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.jGsDCNMB6zkZV4xX]{激流先锋 Vanguard of Roaring Waters}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.CkgQ29vZ8VT7tibE]{古战历客 Witness to Ancient Battles}

Apparition's Awareness.name: 精魄意识 Apparition's Awareness
Apparition's Awareness.description: 你的精魄让你注意到你可能会忽略的细节。你的察觉熟练等级提升至专家。

Apparition’s Warning.name: 精魄预警 Apparition’s Warning
Apparition’s Warning.description: 灵体在伤害发生前你对进行预警，让你有更多时间反应。你的反射豁免熟练等级提升至专家。

Barrow's Edge.name: 古冢之缘 Barrow's Edge
Barrow's Edge.description:
用途 一件能够造成穿刺或挥砍伤害的近战武器

宝剑在剑鞘中铮然作响，好像它想出鞘，消耗它的暴戾之气。

固有 你的武器对被它打击伤害到的生物造成每伤害骰1点持续精魄伤害

超越技—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.TFvjSFkM0oiiXyo1]{饮敌之仇 Drink of my Foes}

Born of the Bones of the Earth.name: 生于地中之骨 Born of the Bones of the Earth
Born of the Bones of the Earth.description:
你统治石与土，所有传奇舞台的基石与竞技场的奠基。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C0Tcelg3BAPhML6J]{配达人 Hefty Hauler} 专长，你可以选择你的典范能力造成的任何精魄伤害，在他们周围唤起漂浮的骨片与石子，将伤害类型更改为钝击，并将精魄特征替换为土特征。你的武器图标获得以下能力。.

固有 当你成功重击，且重击的目标站在地面或石头上时, 他被推倒并埋于土中. 目标 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 并且必须成功进行一次对抗你职业DC的 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 动作来结束禁足. 如果生物是无形的，那么他就不会陷入禁足, 例如液体（如水元素或泥怪），他们可以毫不费力地逃脱.

超越技—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.pMb8Q7A5iM3rLz8E]{世界之伤 Wound The World}

Brave.name: 无畏 Brave
Brave.description: 你的行为展示了何为无畏：当野兽出现时，你会与它战斗；当有人在黑暗中迷路时，你是第一个伸出援手之人。你在运动上受训。在你以身体圣痕进行超越技之后，你的身体会带着你前进，你以一半的速度直线走向你选择的一个敌人。

Channeler.name: 通灵师 Channeler
Channeler.description:
通灵师倾向于与大量的精魄更自由地联系，因为他们天生就擅长于作为灵魂能量的媒介。因为他们倾向于不与单一精魄产生深厚联系，所以能够更轻易地运用多个精魄的力量。通灵师通常是旅行者，行脚商，或类似漂流客，将故事从一座城镇带向另一座城镇。他们经常与自己周围当地自然环境的精魄产生联系：例如，在火山口旅行时，附灵上石火管家（steward of stone and fire）。

初始恩惠: 1级时，你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-feats.Item.sGKursdBYDehFYuJ]{通灵师架势 Channeler's Stance} 专长，以及@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.Item.G2croA4K8EXWbMRl]{精魄旋替 Apparition's Whirl} 动作。

中等恩惠: 9 级时，你的强韧豁免熟练等级提升至大师。当你在意志豁免上掷骰出成功结果，你改为取得大成功。

**笔记: 这是游戏测试中写的内容；我们正在等待刊物，但我们已经将其实现为 "当你在强韧豁免中取得成功, 你改为获得大成功"

高等恩惠: 13级时，你的轻甲，中甲，和无甲防御熟练等级提升至专家。

最终恩惠: 17级时，你在一场遭遇中第一次进入由某个灵媒专长赋予的架势时，你获得等同于你等级的一半+2（最小为3）的临时生命值。这些临时生命值持续1分钟。

Cunning.name: 狡诈 Cunning
Cunning.description: 为什么要和野兔在草地上赛跑，或者和鲑鱼在瀑布上比赛游泳？为什么要在面对巨人时进行力量对抗？用一点创造力打败你的敌人不是更好吗？毕竟，在历史上回响的故事总是那些智慧和诡计取巧，而不是靠着原始的天赋或力量胜利的故事。你在欺骗上受训。当你使用你的身体圣痕超越技后，你可以自由动作进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feint}

Deific Mastery.name: Deific Mastery
Deific Mastery.description: You have achieved mastery over the divine power that flows through you. Your proficiency rank for your exemplar class DC increases to master. If you have domain spells, your proficiency rank for spell attacks and spell DC increases to master.

Divine Premonition.name: Divine Premonition
Divine Premonition.description: A sense of the flow of fate allows you to respond to danger with uncanny alacrity. Your proficiency rank for Reflex saves increases to expert.

Divine Spark and Ikons.name: Divine Spark and Ikons
Divine Spark and Ikons.description:
Within your soul is a tiny spark of divine power that belongs not to a deity but something all your own. You can manifest this divine power through special items known as ikons. Ikons are items intrinsically linked to you—sacred vessels crystallized from your divinity that are capable of legendary feats in your hands. There are three types of ikons: body ikons are a mark on your flesh that shows you as more than mortal, worn ikons are sacred clothing or other raiment, and weapon ikons let you carve your story onto the world. Choose three ikons, one of each type. Your body takes on the qualities of your chosen body ikon, and you gain non-magical, level-0 items of your choice that satisfy the requirements for your chosen worn ikon and weapon ikon. Providence ensures you come across these items; you might be traveling along a path to find a spear in a tree that only you can dislodge, or you might awaken holding a gleaming sash you saw in your dreams.

By focusing your divine spark into one of your ikons, you empower that ikon to accomplish deeds beyond what it could in mortal hands. As long as your divine spark resides in an ikon, you gain that ikon's immanence effect. You can call your spark forth and place it into an ikon by using the @Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.oRp8IV0Jqjtzj82l]{Shift Immanence} action.

While your spark dwells within an ikon, you are also able to channel your divinity through the ikon in a powerful transcendence ability—though the force of this act will temporarily cast your divine spark out of the ikon.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.Item.DccQze1mz8yP7LgJ]{Spark Transcendence}

Dominion Epithet.name: Dominion Epithet
Dominion Epithet.description:
Your divinity has grown in power along with your deeds, allowing you to begin claiming dominion over aspects usually reserved for the gods. Choose one of the following epithets, which affect your weapon ikon.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.KJGuufhSPwn6EWiM]{Born of the Bones of the Earth}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.VDWsFE7Qb52H2IXJ]{Peerless Under Heaven}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.BB1lsBxwpuvtDBBE]{Restless as the Tide}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.tG5S0JyfNHT8UpSX]{Whose Cry is Thunder}

Expert Spellcaster (Animist).name: Expert Spellcaster (Animist)
Expert Spellcaster (Animist).description: The spirits' magic flows freely through you. Your proficiency ranks for your spell attack modifier and spell DC increase to expert.

Eye-Catching Spot.name: Eye-Catching Spot
Eye-Catching Spot.description:
A fetching beauty spot under an eye or a smile as warm as the sun distracts foes and captures hearts alike.

Immanence Your beauty becomes supernaturally enhanced, distracting foes and imposing a –1 circumstance penalty to melee attack rolls against you.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.kohnyHhsWn4xuPsA]{Captivating Charm}

Fated Shot.name: Fated Shot
Fated Shot.description:
Usage a ranged weapon

Your missiles shine as they fly through the air like falling stars.

Immanence Your weapon ikon deals 1 additional spirit damage per weapon damage die to creatures it Strikes.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.FdZHceXgL30YBXpR]{Rain of Seven Lights}

Fourth Apparition.name: Fourth Apparition
Fourth Apparition.description: You're truly loved by the spirits, with apparitions flocking to you from far and wide. When you attune to apparitions during your daily preparations, you choose four apparitions to attune to, with one of them being your primary apparition.

Gaze Sharp as Steel.name: Gaze Sharp as Steel
Gaze Sharp as Steel.description:
Your eyes glint with an almost-tangible sharpness, letting you spot the tiniest dove on the horizon or the swiftest arrow in flight.

Immanence Your vision sharpens and allows you to sense an enemy's attack almost as soon as it begins, granting you a +1 status bonus to Perception checks and a +2 status bonus to your AC against ranged attacks.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.lHJNsq5YpnJLHrOP]{A Moment Unending}

Gleaming Blade.name: Gleaming Blade
Gleaming Blade.description:
Usage any weapon in the sword or knife group

This sword glitters with such sharpness it seems to cut the very air in front of it, the faster it can be drawn.

Immanence Your weapon ikon deals 2 additional spirit damage per weapon damage die to creatures it Strikes.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.czDAzMbNrph1AJ0K]{Mirrored Spirit Strike}

Godly Expertise.name: Godly Expertise
Godly Expertise.description: Your ability to wield your divine power effectively increases. Your proficiency rank for your exemplar class DC increases to expert. If you have domain spells, your proficiency rank for spell attacks and spell DC increases to expert.

Greater Resolve (Exemplar).name: Greater Resolve (Exemplar)
Greater Resolve (Exemplar).description:
Your unbelievable training grants you mental resiliency.

Your proficiency rank for Will saves increases to legendary. When you roll a success at a Will save, you get a critical success. When you roll a critical failure at a Will save, you get a failure instead. When you roll a failure on a Will save against a damaging effect, you take half damage.

Greater Spirit Striking.name: Greater Spirit Striking
Greater Spirit Striking.description: Your additional damage from spirit striking increases to 4 with weapons and unarmed attacks in which you're an expert, 6 if you're a master, and 8 if you're legendary.

Humble Strikes.name: Humble Strikes
Humble Strikes.description: Even the most unassuming weapons can accomplish heroic deeds in your hands. When you are wielding a simple weapon, increase the damage die size of that weapon by one step.

Ikons.name: Ikons
Ikons.description:
As an exemplar, you gain three ikons: one that marks your body as more than mortal, one piece of worn raiment, and one weapon to carve your story onto the world. Choose one ikon from each category.

Your ikons can be etched with runes, upgraded, or otherwise modified as normal for items of their type. If you acquire a new object of the same general type, you can switch your ikon to the new object by spending 1 day of downtime with the new ikon as you saturate the object with your divine energy. You can use this process to make an existing magic item, like a cloak of illusions or a searing blade, into your ikon if the item is equal to your level or lower; this makes the item a divine item, removing the arcane, occult, primal, or magical trait from the item and adding the divine trait, if it didn't have it already.

Body Ikons

Body ikons accentuate a physical trait of an exemplar's body and so cannot be stolen, disarmed, dispelled, or otherwise taken away.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.gOkL1e5uexDEvYog]{Eye-Catching Spot}

Imposter in Hidden Places.name: Imposter in Hidden Places
Imposter in Hidden Places.description:
Impostors in hidden places whisper in quiet corners where mortal voices rarely echo, hoarding secrets and pondering unknowable truths. They often bring misfortune to those who disturb them, though an animist who can earn their trust will find that they make effective allies. Impostors in hidden places are shy and occasionally quite spiteful.

Apparition Skills

Fortune-Telling Lore, Underworld Lore

Apparition Spells

Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Telekinetic Hand}; 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6ZIKB0151LUR19Rw]{Ill Omen}; 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}; 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection}; 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GzdgM0m7wXKuFSho]{Rope Trick}; 5th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.U58aQWJ47VrI36yP]{Hallucination}; 6th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WPXzPl7YbMEIGWfi]{Mislead}; 7th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vPWMEyVTreMOoFnm]{Magnificent Mansion}; 8th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wfleiawxsfhpRRwf]{Disappearance}; 9th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qDjeG6dxT4aEEC6J]{Weird}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-spells.auDBkDxxgB4VIjJb]{Discomfiting Whispers}

Avatar

Whisper Hiding in Shadows Speed 50 feet, fly Speed 50 feet;

Melee 1 touch of lost futures (versatile cold), Damage 6d10+6 void;

Ranged 1 whisper of despair (range 120 feet), Damage 6d6+6 void

Juggernaut (Exemplar).name: Juggernaut (Exemplar)
Juggernaut (Exemplar).description: Your body is accustomed to physical hardship and resistant to ailments. Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to master. When you roll a success on a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead.

Legendary Spellcaster (Animist).name: Legendary Spellcaster (Animist)
Legendary Spellcaster (Animist).description: You are a near-perfect channel for the magical energies of the realms beyond. Your proficiency ranks for spell attack modifier and spell DC increase to legendary.

Master Spellcaster (Animist).name: Master Spellcaster (Animist)
Master Spellcaster (Animist).description: Your affinity with the apparitions you bond to has further enhanced the potency of your magic. Your proficiency ranks for spell attack modifier and spell DC increase to master.

Mournful.name: Mournful
Mournful.description: To be a hero is to endure countless hardships and stand where others have fallen, shouldering dreams and destinies in their stead. Though this weight may reach your eyes, you bear this burden so that those under you can live smiling. You are trained in Diplomacy. When you Spark Transcendence of your body ikon, the act has a bittersweet poignancy to it, making one enemy within 30 feet @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} as tears or memories dance in their eyes. This is a mental and emotion effect. The enemy remains dazzled until the start of your next turn.

Noble Branch.name: Noble Branch
Noble Branch.description:
Usage any weapon in the spear or polearm weapon group, or the staff, bo staff, fighting stick, or khakkara

This simple stick-like weapon has a simplicity and elegance to it all its own.

Immanence Your weapon ikon deals 2 additional spirit damage per weapon damage die to creatures it Strikes.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.4BI7VObdozZYkmug]{Strike, Breathe, Rend}

Palisade Bangles.name: Palisade Bangles
Palisade Bangles.description:
Usage worn bracers

These armbands signify rejection and acceptance; rejection of harm, and acceptance of your inevitable dominance over your enemies.

Immanence (aura) You are surrounded by a 15-foot aura that protects you and all allies within the aura from harm, granting a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. This bonus increases to +2 for anyone in the aura who has a buckler raised, or +3 if they have a shield raised.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.CCNG68lA1FssCrL2]{Embrace of Destiny}

Peerless Under Heaven.name: Peerless Under Heaven
Peerless Under Heaven.description:
For as long as there have been gods, they have made war, and you aim to stand atop the pile when the fighting's over. You can choose for any spirit damage dealt by your exemplar abilities to instead manifest as powerful impacts, cutting slashes, or temporarily conjured physical armaments, removing the spirit trait and dealing physical damage instead. If dealt as part of a weapon attack, this damage is of the same type as the weapon; otherwise it is your choice of bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage. Your weapon ikon gains the following abilities.

Immanence Divine skill at arms guides your weapon, granting it the critical specialization effect for its weapon group.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.v9SZgHp8Bxaf1796]{Reap the Field}

Radiant.name: Radiant
Radiant.description: Heroes live bigger lives than any other, shining so brightly that they attract followers, inspire troops, and change the course of kingdoms. You are trained in Diplomacy. After you Spark Transcendence of your body ikon, you inspire an ally within 30 feet to push on, restoring Hit Points equal to [[/r 2*(1 + @actor.level)[healing]]]{2 + double your level}; this is a mental and emotion effect. The ally is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

Restless as the Tide.name: Restless as the Tide
Restless as the Tide.description:
Your dominion is over the ocean, the great source and ultimate taker of lives. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iOY6YfGBaOvMNAor]{Underwater Marauder} feat. You can choose for any spirit damage dealt by your exemplar abilities to instead manifest as surging streams of water, changing the damage type to bludgeoning and replacing the spirit trait with the water trait. Your weapon ikon gains the following abilities.

Immanence When you critically succeed on a Strike, you deal splash damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice to all creatures within 10 feet. The splash damage is bludgeoning and has the water trait.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.oS3fxvVUgF6QeDIH]{Sea's Claim}

Root Epithet.name: Root Epithet
Root Epithet.description:
When your divine spark bonded with your soul, it became dyed in your personality and qualities. As your deeds give shape to this nascent divinity, you come to bear an epithet—a word or phrase that reflects your story and that others come to call you by. Your epithets each affect one of your ikons, granting it additional capacities.

At 3rd level, you gain a root epithet, which describes the core of your personality and affects the qualities of your body ikon. If you are already trained in the granted skill, you become trained in a different skill of your choice, as normal. Choose one epithet from the list below.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.ccnjUUPmLzVVUzh2]{Brave}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.AYjhWPhF3tCU82LB]{Cunning}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.HiAbSUTzSwDuKE5O]{Mournful}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.mNteQRazYFAu0tcN]{Radiant}

Sage.name: Sage
Sage.description:
Sages are particularly sensitive to the presence and influence of spirits and undead. They can easily detect lingering spirits and help create resolutions between spiritual entities and whatever barriers are preventing them from resting peacefully. Some sages may even serve as go-betweens for spirits that intentionally linger to watch over a site or community, allowing them to speak to the people they knew in life. Sages are often community leaders or educators and frequently associate with apparitions of fixed sites of power, like custodians of groves and gardens or other apparitions of knowledge.

Initial Boon: At 1st level, your ability to sink into your apparition is especially potent. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-feats.Item.fSKnrAHbhFgB8112]{Apparition Sense} feat and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.Item.q1O52OO0jUwzQMxq]{Apparition's Possession} action.

Intermediate Boon: At 9th level, your proficiency ranks for light armor, medium armor, and unarmored defense increase to expert.

Greater Boon: At 13th level, you gain spirit resistance equal to half your level and a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spirit effects. You are immune to any effect that separates your soul from your body against your will, such as the seize soul spell.

Ultimate Boon: At 17th level, whenever a haunt, spirit, undead, or incorporeal creature fails a saving throw against your spells, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC and saving throws against all of that entity's attacks and abilities for the next 24 hours. This bonus applies only to the entity that failed its save, not others of the same type. In addition, you can select up to two apparitions as your primary apparition during your daily preparations.

Scar of the Survivor.name: Scar of the Survivor
Scar of the Survivor.description:
A scar on your body commemorates a time someone tried to end your story and failed—a testament to your resilience and fortitude.

Immanence Divine energy spreads outward from your scar, reinforcing your flesh. You gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.I0BhPWqYf1bbzEYg]{Diehard} feat and a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.hw6vY8bDDoNhaD6u]{No Scar but This}

Skin Hard as Horn.name: Skin Hard as Horn
Skin Hard as Horn.description:
Tempered in your spirit, your very skin is as a suit of armor, though a single location on your body remains unprotected, a curse and a challenge within your legend.

Immanence You gain resistance to bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage equal to half your level. You make this choice when you gain this ikon, and it can't be changed thereafter. This resistance doesn't apply against critical hits, which successfully find your unprotected spot.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.q3odPW5lzuTNKp7x]{Crash Against Me}

Skybearer's Belt.name: Skybearer's Belt
Skybearer's Belt.description:
Usage worn belt

This girdle wraps around your waist, magnifying your strength to the point you feel you could carry the sky itself.

Immanence (aura) Strength flows outward from you, allowing all allies within 15 feet to carry 4 more Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered and up to a maximum of 8 more Bulk. You (but not your allies) can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} creatures up to two sizes larger than you.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.Hxe9TkKSichNnUDi]{Bear Allies' Burdens}

Sovereignty Epithet.name: Sovereignty Epithet
Sovereignty Epithet.description:
The litany of heroic deeds left in your wake has caused your divine spark to grow in power, bright enough that it now illuminates your legacy. Choose one of the following epithets, which affect your worn ikon.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.UhcTDbAkikVqjDNe]{Teacher of Heroes}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.7BPSfx6h6VdZLz3g]{The Last Ruler}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-class-features.Item.QYuc1Yumr7AN002s]{Thief of Moonlight}

Spirit Striking.name: Spirit Striking
Spirit Striking.description: Your power can't be contained, escaping in sparks and embers through your weapons as you wreak violence. You deal 2 additional spirit damage with weapons and unarmed attacks in which you are an expert. This damage increases to 3 if you're a master, and 4 if you're legendary.

Spiritual Fortitude.name: Spiritual Fortitude
Spiritual Fortitude.description: Spiritual energy reinforces your body. Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to expert.

Stalker in Darkened Boughs.name: Stalker in Darkened Boughs
Stalker in Darkened Boughs.description:
Stalkers in darkened boughs make their homes in ancient forests and jungles unfriendly to humanoids and others who would exert control or influence over nature's designs. These apparitions are drawn to animists who harbor violent thoughts or impulses but are more likely to linger with animists who can quell their hatred. Stalkers in darkened boughs are moody, impulsive, and prone to seeing things from the least charitable perspective.

Apparition Skills

Forest Lore, Herbalism Lore

Apparition Spells

Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MPxbKoR54gkYkqLO]{Gouging Claw}; 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EE7Q5BHIrfWNCPtT]{Runic Body}; 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangling Flora}; 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Wall of Thorns}; 4th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Speak with Plants}; 5th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YtesyvfAIwXOqISq]{Moon Frenzy}; 6th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JbAcSLu62TU1OgNF]{Tangling Creepers}; 7th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bVtkBJvGLP69qVGI]{Unfettered Pack}; 8th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}; 9th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yLJROsQtyrPIKcDx]{Wrathful Storm}

Vessel Spell

@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-spells.nPJHG83cVsrKGcmY]{Darkened Forest Form}

Avatar

Beast of the Boughs Speed 70 feet, fly Speed 70 feet;

Melee 1 devouring jaws (deadly d10, reach 15 feet), Damage 6d10+6 piercing

Steward of Stone and Fire.name: Steward of Stone and Fire
Steward of Stone and Fire.description:
Stewards of stone and fire linger near volcanoes and the deep places near the heart of the earth, though particularly old rock formations, canyons, and other natural features of earth may also spawn or attract them. Stewards of stone and fire are quick to anger and slow to forget.

Apparition Skills

Mountain Lore, Volcano Lore

Apparition Spells

Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6DfLZBl8wKIV03Iq]{Ignition}; 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HokKyQl5g655xx9U]{Interposing Earth}; 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.v89KwyaBd6g5rWVS]{Exploding Earth}; 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}; 4th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{Wall of Fire}; 5th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kOa055FIrO9Smnya]{Wall of Stone}; 6th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{Petrify}; 7th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O7ZEqWjwdKyo2CUv]{Volcanic Eruption}; 8th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Earthquake}; 9th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jrBa9deU2ULFWvSl]{Falling Stars}

Vessel Spell

@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-spells.CeQNry1G1EcxO1SK]{Earth's Bile}

Avatar

Blood of Planets Speed 50 feet, burrow Speed 50 feet, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;

Melee 1 avalanche of molten stone (versatile B), Damage 6d10+6 fire;

Ranged 1 cleansing eruption (fire, range 120 feet), Damage 6d6+6 fire

Supreme Incarnation.name: Supreme Incarnation
Supreme Incarnation.description: You become a nexus between the mortal and spiritual realms, capable of serving as the channel for your apparition to incarnate its full might through you. You gain a 10th-rank apparition spell slot. In addition to heightened versions of your apparition spells, you can use this slot to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ckUOoqOM7Kg7VqxB]{Avatar}. When you cast avatar in this way, you do not become an avatar of a deity; rather, your primary attuned apparition incarnates itself using your body, transforming you into the avatar described in your primary attuned apparition's entry.

Teacher of Heroes.name: Teacher of Heroes
Teacher of Heroes.description:
Those who make great names for themselves as heroes are called upon to train those who follow them, and such is your destiny—to be remembered through your progeny.

Immanence The aura granted by your worn ikon increases to 30 feet. Whenever you fail or deal no damage with a Strike against an enemy within your worn ikon's aura, you can attempt a Recall Knowledge check against that target and instantly transmit any knowledge you gain as a result to every ally within the aura. The first piece of knowledge you gain when Recalling Knowledge in this way is always the enemy's immunities (if any) or greatest resistance (if they do not have any immunities). If the target does not have any immunities or resistances, you instead learn their greatest weakness. If the target does not have any immunities, resistances, or weaknesses, you learn what their lowest saving throw is.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.fzIajY2GXXE58jPT]{Complete the Hero's Journey}

Third Apparition.name: Third Apparition
Third Apparition.description: You've learned to shelter more spirits, gaining access to more magic. When you attune to apparitions during your daily preparations, you choose three apparitions to attune to, with one of them being your primary apparition. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Thousand-League Sandals.name: Thousand-League Sandals
Thousand-League Sandals.description:
Usage worn shoes

Worn and trustworthy, your sandals have carried you this far, and they'll carry you much further still.

Immanence (aura) Your sandals ease your travels on the path ahead, granting you and all allies within 15 feet a +10 status bonus to your Speed.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.nrJ7lHwG1vwupfiM]{Marathon Dash}

Titan's Breaker.name: Titan's Breaker
Titan's Breaker.description:
Usage any melee weapon in the club, hammer, or axe group

You wield a weapon whose blows shatter mountains with ease.

Immanence Your weapon ikon deals 2 additional spirit damage per weapon damage die to creatures it Strikes. Constructs and objects are not immune to this spirit damage and this spirit damage automatically bypasses any Hardness they have.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.8lI9kWKLaqoQnBDH]{Fracture Mountains}

Vanguard of Roaring Waters.name: Vanguard of Roaring Waters
Vanguard of Roaring Waters.description:
Vanguards of roaring waters are most commonly found where rivers carve their way through mountains, creating fearsome rapids. They can also be found near bays where rivers meet the sea and create turbulent breakers and unpredictable undertows. Vanguards of roaring waters encourage chaos and are easily bored. Apparition Skill Mountain Lore, River Lore

Apparition Spells

Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zhDIiQlJmrd4UDNC]{Rousing Splash}; 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jfVCuOpzC6mUrf6f]{Hydraulic Push}; 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}; 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.oUDNCArkQTdhllxD]{Aqueous Orb}; 4th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Y3G6Y6EDgCY0s3fq]{Hydraulic Torrent}; 5th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zfn5RqAdF63neqpP]{Control Water}; 6th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K2bTUhucPyhXlzjw]{Personal Ocean}; 7th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.smiVuoFMSgY2FTOO]{Dancing Fountain}; 8th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.0fjz8qc9NfkmWmJZ]{Whirlpool}; 9th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yLJROsQtyrPIKcDx]{Wrathful Storm}

Vessel Spell

@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-spells.8cvXMUfgCxGZfhrI]{River Carving Mountains}

Avatar

River that Splits the World Speed 50 feet, swim Speed 70 feet;

Melee 1 parting mountains (versatile S, water), Damage 6d10+6 bludgeoning,

Ranged 1 crash into the sea (range 120 feet, versatile P, water), Damage 6d6+6 bludgeoning

Victor's Wreath.name: Victor's Wreath
Victor's Wreath.description:
Usage worn headwear or worn sash

This symbol of victory—whether a laurel worn around the head or a medal that hangs from your neck—reminds you and your allies that victory is the only acceptable outcome.

Immanence (aura, emotion, mental) You inspire your allies to greater glory. You and all allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.5nNEKaS37swT00Lo]{One Moment till Glory}

Vigilant Senses (Exemplar).name: Vigilant Senses (Exemplar)
Vigilant Senses (Exemplar).description: Through your adventures, you've developed keen awareness and attention to detail. Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

Weapon Expertise (Exemplar).name: Weapon Expertise (Exemplar)
Weapon Expertise (Exemplar).description: You've dedicated yourself to learning the intricacies of your weapons. Your proficiency ranks for unarmed attacks, simple weapons, and martial weapons increase to expert.

Whose Cry is Thunder.name: Whose Cry is Thunder
Whose Cry is Thunder.description:
The sky overhead is yours to command as lightning strikes your soul. Any bonus to saving throws you gain from an exemplar ability also applies against effects with the electricity trait, and any resistance applies to electricity damage. You can choose for any spirit damage dealt by your exemplar abilities to instead manifest as crackling lightning, changing the damage type to electricity and replacing the spirit trait with the electricity trait. Your weapon ikon gains the following abilities.

Immanence When you critically succeed on a Strike, lightning strikes a target within 30 feet for @Damage[4d6[electricity]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true). This damage increases to @Damage[7d6[electricity]] if you are 12th level and @Damage[10d6[electricity]] if you are 17th level.

Transcend—@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-actions.2XT5pJP1KvuxY4qi]{Judgment from Clear Skies}

Witness to Ancient Battles.name: Witness to Ancient Battles
Witness to Ancient Battles.description:
Witnesses to ancient battles may be the restless souls of warriors left unfulfilled by their final contest, valkyries and other beings from beyond naturally drawn to sites of death and battle, or even the unquiet entity formed from a battle or battlefield that has seen so much death and blood it has gained a spiritual essence of its own. Custodian of Groves and Gardens.description:
Custodians of groves and gardens frequent tended greenery and farmlands cared for by loving stewards. These apparitions are drawn to peaceful pursuits, study, and quiet reflection. Some linger in the mortal realms not because they have lost their way, but because they believe they have already found Elysium. Custodians of groves and gardens are peaceful, quiet, and averse to conflict.

Divine Weapon Mastery.description: Your skill with weapons is divinely inspired. Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons, martial weapons, and unarmed attacks increase to master.

The Last Ruler.name: The Last Ruler
The Last Ruler.description:
Whether your destiny is monarch or god, the spirit of all true rulers that have ever been or shall ever be suffuses your power and dominion, granting you an unrivaled commanding presence.

Immanence The aura granted by your worn ikon increases to 30 feet. Whenever an enemy within the aura fails an attack roll against you, you can attempt an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} them as a free action as you rebuke them for their foolish attempt to stand against you.

Thief of Moonlight.name: Thief of Moonlight
Thief of Moonlight.description:
Your deeds are spoken of in whispers and half-believed rumors. You walk unseen, hiding behind stars, capable of taking anything: the lights of the heavens themselves are not safe from your avarice.

Immanence The aura granted by your worn ikon increases to 30 feet. Whenever an enemy within the aura fails an attack roll against you, you snatch a fragment of the light from their eyes, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the end of your next turn.
